title: Name problem
body:
I had a name on my old account that I deleted to free up for this account. But it won't let me use the name. Is there something wrong with the name system?

I use that name for about a year so there shouldn't be anything wrong with it as of now.

I should also add that the name isn't very long, and that it has no curse words in it or anything offencive.

Confused.

replies.body: What was the name and how long has it been since it was deleted? I can check up and let you know what's going on for ya.

Thats okay. I understand now. That page explained everything. The name is no good anymore. I do wonder why its that way. 

I'll ask something through support.

Thank you.

Hey again, Krazymaid! Glad to see you.

Refer to this [_**link**_](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202647784-Account-Deletion-FAQ#h2q2).

I'm sorry. But the name is probably forbidden now.
